pitch.cc: Edinson Volquez has thrown 82 pitches but has plenty left in the tank, with his fastball sitting at 93 over the past 10 pitches.
Dangerous count for Edinson Volquez; Ben Zobrist is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .942 OPS against them this season and .817 against everything else.
Edinson Volquez is having trouble locating his sinker, missing the strike zone with his last three.

pitch.cc: James Shields may prefer to go after Ryan Hanigan, whose OPS is .646 this season, with the slider rather than facing Drew Stubbs, whose OPS is .735.
James Shields is having trouble locating his four-seam fastball, missing the strike zone with his last three.

pitch.cc: James Shields showed faith in Kelly Shoppach by throwing that knuckle curve in the dirt with a runner on 3rd.
James Shields is really trying to keep Drew Stubbs close; he is 23-for-27 in stolen base attempts this season.
